00133 class WXDLLIMPEXP_ADVTABLE wxAdvHdrCellEvent : public wxNotifyEvent
00134 {
00135 public:
00136         wxAdvHdrCellEvent()
00137         : wxNotifyEvent()
00138         {
00139                 m_hdrCell = NULL;
00140                 m_x = -1;
00141                 m_y = -1;
00142                 m_control = false;
00143                 m_shift = false;
00144                 m_alt = false;
00145                 m_meta = false;
00146         }
00147 
00148         wxAdvHdrCellEvent(int id, wxEventType type, wxObject* obj,
00149                         wxAdvHdrCell *hdrCell, int x = -1, int y = -1,
00150                         bool control = false, bool shift = false, bool alt = false, bool meta = false);
00151 
00152 
00153         wxAdvHdrCell *GetHdrCell() { return m_hdrCell; }
00154         wxPoint     GetPosition() { return wxPoint( m_x, m_y ); }
00155         bool        ControlDown() { return m_control; }
00156         bool        MetaDown() { return m_meta; }
00157         bool        ShiftDown() { return m_shift; }
00158         bool        AltDown() { return m_alt; }
00159         bool        CmdDown()
00160         {
00161 #if defined(__WXMAC__) || defined(__WXCOCOA__)
00162                 return MetaDown();
00163 #else
00164                 return ControlDown();
00165 #endif
00166         }
00167 
00168         virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxAdvHdrCellEvent(*this); }
00169 
00170 protected:
00171         wxAdvHdrCell *m_hdrCell;
00172         int         m_x;
00173         int         m_y;
00174         bool        m_control;
00175         bool        m_meta;
00176         bool        m_shift;
00177         bool        m_alt;
00178 
00179         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS_NO_ASSIGN(wxAdvHdrCellEvent)
00180 };

00215         }

00218         {
00219         }
00220 
00226         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00227         {
00228                 m_row = row;
00229                 m_col = col;
00230         }
00231 
00236         void operator = (const wxAdvCoord &o)
00237         {
00238                 m_row = o.m_row;
00239                 m_col = o.m_col;
00240         }
00241 
00246         bool IsSet()
00247         {
00248                 return (m_row != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col != UNDEF_SIZE);
00249         }
00250 
00254         void Unset()
00255         {
00256                 m_row = UNDEF_SIZE;
00257                 m_col = UNDEF_SIZE;
00258         }
00259 
00266         bool Equal(size_t row, size_t col)
00267         {
00268                 return (m_row == row) && (m_col == col);
00269         }
00270 
00275         size_t Row()
00276         {
00277                 return m_row;
00278         }
00279 
00284         size_t Col()
00285         {
00286                 return m_col;
00287         }
00288 
00289 private:
00290         size_t m_row, m_col;
00291 };

00296 class WXDLLIMPEXP_ADVTABLE wxAdvRange
00297 {
00298 public:
00299         wxAdvRange()
00300         {
00301                 Unset();
00302         }
00303 
00311         wxAdvRange(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00312         {
00313                 Set(row1, col1, row2, col2);
00314         }
00315 
00316         virtual ~wxAdvRange()
00317         {
00318         }
00319 
00325         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00326         {
00327                 m_row1 = row;
00328                 m_col1 = col;
00329                 m_row2 = row;
00330                 m_col2 = col;
00331         }
00332 
00340         void Set(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00341         {
00342                 m_row1 = row1;
00343                 m_col1 = col1;
00344                 m_row2 = row2;
00345                 m_col2 = col2;
00346         }
00347 
00351         void Unset()
00352         {
00353                 Set(UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE);
00354         }
00355 
00360         bool IsSet()
00361         {
00362                 return (m_row1 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col1 != UNDEF_SIZE) &&
00363                                 (m_row2 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col2 != UNDEF_SIZE);
00364         }
00365 
00372         bool Contains(size_t row, size_t col)
00373         {
00374                 return (row >= TopRow() && row <= BottomRow()) &&
00375                                 (col >= LeftCol() && col <= RightCol());
00376         }
00377 
00383         bool ContainsRow(size_t row)
00384         {
00385                 return (row >= TopRow() && row <= BottomRow());
00386         }
00387 
00393         bool ContainsCol(size_t col)
00394         {
00395                 return (col >= LeftCol() && col <= RightCol());
00396         }
00397 
00402         bool IsSingleCell()
00403         {
00404                 return ((TopRow() == BottomRow()) &&
00405                                 (LeftCol() == RightCol()));
00406         }
00407 
00416         bool Equals(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00417         {
00418                 return (m_row1 == row1) && (m_col1 == col1)
00419                                 && (m_row2 == row2) && (m_col2 == col2);
00420         }
00421 
00426         void operator = (const wxAdvRange &o)
00427         {
00428                 m_row1 = o.m_row1;
00429                 m_col1 = o.m_col1;
00430                 m_row2 = o.m_row2;
00431                 m_col2 = o.m_col2;
00432         }
00433 
00434         size_t Row1()
00435         {
00436                 return m_row1;
00437         }
00438 
00439         size_t Row2()
00440         {
00441                 return m_row2;
00442         }
00443 
00444         size_t Col1()
00445         {
00446                 return m_col1;
00447         }
00448 
00449         size_t Col2()
00450         {
00451                 return m_col2;
00452         }
00453 
00458         size_t TopRow()
00459         {
00460                 return min(m_row1, m_row2);
00461         }
00462 
00467         size_t BottomRow()
00468         {
00469                 return max(m_row1, m_row2);
00470         }
00471 
00476         size_t LeftCol()
00477         {
00478                 return min(m_col1, m_col2);
00479         }
00480 
00485         size_t RightCol()
00486         {
00487                 return max(m_col1, m_col2);
00488         }
00489 
00490 private:
00491         size_t min(size_t a, size_t b)
00492         {
00493                 size_t m = wxMin(a, b);
00494                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00495                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00496                                 m = a;
00497                         }
00498                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00499                                 m = b;
00500                         }
00501                 }
00502                 return m;
00503         }
00504 
00505         size_t max(size_t a, size_t b)
00506         {
00507                 size_t m = wxMax(a, b);
00508                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00509                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00510                                 m = a;
00511                         }
00512                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00513                                 m = b;
00514                         }
00515                 }
00516                 return m;
00517         }
00518 
00519         size_t m_row1, m_col1;
00520         size_t m_row2, m_col2;
00521 };

01310 
01327 class WXDLLIMPEXP_ADVTABLE wxAdvHdrCell
01328 {
01329         friend class wxAdvTable;
01330         friend class wxAdvDefaultHdrCellRenderer;
01331 
01332 public:
01333         static const int defaultSpacing;
01334         static const int defaultAlignVertical;
01335         static const int defaultAlignHorizontal;
01336 
01340         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxAdvHdrCell &o)
01341         {
01342                 // copy attributes
01343                 m_label = o.m_label;
01344                 m_size  = o.m_size;
01345                 m_alignVertical = o.m_alignVertical;
01346                 m_alignHorizontal = o.m_alignHorizontal;
01347                 m_spacing = o.m_spacing;
01348                 m_verticalText = o.m_verticalText;
01349                 m_sortable = o.m_sortable;
01350                 m_resizeAllowed = o.m_resizeAllowed;
01351 
01352                 m_minSize = o.m_minSize;
01353                 m_maxSize = o.m_maxSize;
01354 
01355                 if (o.m_renderer != NULL) {
01356                         m_renderer = o.m_renderer->Clone();
01357                 }
01358                 else {
01359                         m_renderer = NULL;
01360                 }
01361 
01362                 // copy internals
01363                 m_rc = o.m_rc;
01364                 m_decompIndex = o.m_decompIndex;
01365                 m_isRow = o.m_isRow;
01366                 m_parent = o.m_parent;
01367                 m_subIndex = o.m_subIndex;
01368 
01369                 m_table = o.m_table;
01370 
01371                 // copy subcells
01372                 m_subCells = o.m_subCells;
01373                 ReparentSubCells();
01374         }
01375 
01380         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxChar *label = wxT(""))
01381         {
01382                 m_label = label;
01383                 SetDefaults();
01384         }
01385 
01390         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxString &label)
01391         {
01392                 m_label = label;
01393                 SetDefaults();
01394         }
01395 
01396         virtual ~wxAdvHdrCell()
01397         {
01398                 wxDELETE(m_renderer);
01399         }
01400 
01406         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(wxAdvHdrCell subHdrCell)
01407         {
01408                 subHdrCell.m_parent = this;
01409                 subHdrCell.m_isRow = m_isRow;
01410                 subHdrCell.m_subIndex = m_subCells.Count();
01411                 m_subCells.Add(subHdrCell);
01412                 return *this;
01413         }
01414 
01420         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(const wxChar *label)
01421         {
01422                 return Sub(wxAdvHdrCell(label));
01423         }
01424 
01430         bool IsComposite()
01431         {
01432                 return m_subCells.Count() != 0;
01433         }
01434 
01441         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignVertical(int alignVertical)
01442         {
01443                 m_alignVertical = alignVertical;
01444                 return *this;
01445         }
01446 
01451         int AlignVertical()
01452         {
01453                 return m_alignVertical;
01454         }
01455 
01462         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignHorizontal(int alignHorizontal)
01463         {
01464                 m_alignHorizontal = alignHorizontal;
01465                 return *this;
01466         }
01467 
01472         int AlignHorizontal()
01473         {
01474                 return m_alignHorizontal;
01475         }
01476 
01482         wxAdvHdrCell &SetVerticalText(bool verticalText)
01483         {
01484                 m_verticalText = verticalText;
01485                 return *this;
01486         }
01487 
01492         wxAdvHdrCell &VerticalText()
01493         {
01494                 return SetVerticalText(true);
01495         }
01496 
01501         bool IsVerticalText()
01502         {
01503                 return m_verticalText;
01504         }
01505 
01511         wxAdvHdrCell &SetSortable(bool sortable)
01512         {
01513                 m_sortable = sortable;
01514                 return *this;
01515         }
01516 
01521         wxAdvHdrCell &Sortable()
01522         {
01523                 return SetSortable(true);
01524         }
01525 
01530         bool IsSortable()
01531         {
01532                 return m_sortable;
01533         }
01534 
01539         wxAdvHdrCell &ResizeAllowed()
01540         {
01541                 m_resizeAllowed = true;
01542                 return *this;
01543         }
01544 
01550         wxAdvHdrCell &Renderer(wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *renderer)
01551         {
01552                 wxREPLACE(m_renderer, renderer);
01553                 return *this;
01554         }
01555 
01560         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *Renderer()
01561         {
01562                 return m_renderer;
01563         }
01564 
01570         wxAdvHdrCell &Spacing(wxCoord spacing)
01571         {
01572                 m_spacing = spacing;
01573                 return *this;
01574         }
01575 
01580         wxCoord Spacing()
01581         {
01582                 return m_spacing;
01583         }
01584 
01590         wxAdvHdrCell &Label(const wxString &label)
01591         {
01592                 m_label = label;
01593                 return *this;
01594         }
01595 
01600         const wxString &Label()
01601         {
01602                 return m_label;
01603         }
01604 
01611         wxAdvHdrCell &Size(wxCoord size)
01612         {
01613                 m_size = size;
01614                 return *this;
01615         }
01616 
01621         wxCoord Size()
01622         {
01623                 return m_size;
01624         }
01625 
01631         wxAdvHdrCell &MinSize(wxCoord minSize)
01632         {
01633                 m_minSize = minSize;
01634                 return *this;
01635         }
01636 
01641         wxCoord MinSize()
01642         {
01643                 return m_minSize;
01644         }
01645 
01651         wxAdvHdrCell &MaxSize(wxCoord maxSize)
01652         {
01653                 m_maxSize = maxSize;
01654                 return *this;
01655         }
01656 
01661         wxCoord MaxSize()
01662         {
01663                 return m_maxSize;
01664         }
01665 
01670         bool IsSubcell()
01671         {
01672                 return m_parent != NULL;
01673         }
01674 
01679         size_t GetSubCellCount()
01680         {
01681                 return m_subCells.Count();
01682         }
01683 
01689         wxAdvHdrCell *GetSubCell(size_t index)
01690         {
01691                 return &m_subCells[index];
01692         }
01693 
01698         wxSize CalcExtent(wxDC &dc)
01699         {
01700                 wxSize extent = dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(m_label);
01701 
01702                 extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing);
01703                 //extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing + sortArrowSize);
01704 
01705                 if (m_verticalText) {
01706                         // rotate by 90 degrees
01707                         wxCoord tmp = extent.x;
01708                         extent.x = extent.y;
01709                         extent.y = tmp;
01710                 }
01711 
01712                 if (m_size != 0) {
01713                         if (m_isRow) {
01714                                 extent.SetHeight(m_size);
01715                         }
01716                         else {
01717                                 extent.SetWidth(m_size);
01718                         }
01719                 }
01720                 return extent;
01721         }
01722 
01728         size_t Layers()
01729         {
01730                 size_t layers = 1;
01731                 size_t maxSubLayers = IsComposite() ? 1 : 0;
01732 
01733                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(nsub, m_subCells) {
01734                         if (m_subCells[nsub].IsComposite()) {
01735                                 size_t subLayers = m_subCells[nsub].Layers();
01736                                 if (subLayers > maxSubLayers)
01737                                         maxSubLayers = subLayers;
01738                         }
01739                 }
01740                 return layers + maxSubLayers;
01741         }
01742 
01748         size_t GetDecompCellCount()
01749         {
01750                 size_t count = 0;
01751 
01752                 if (!IsComposite()) {
01753                         return 1;
01754                 }
01755 
01756                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01757                         count += m_subCells[n].GetDecompCellCount();
01758                 }
01759                 return count;
01760         }
01761 
01766         bool IsRow()
01767         {
01768                 return m_isRow;
01769         }
01770 
01776         size_t Index()
01777         {
01778                 return m_decompIndex;
01779         }
01780 
01781         bool IsRightEdge()
01782         {
01783                 return (RightSibling() == NULL); // if we have right sibling - cell is right edge
01784         }
01785 
01786         wxAdvHdrCell *RightSibling();
01787 
01794         static size_t GetDecompCellCount(wxAdvHdrCell *cells, size_t numCells);
01795 
01796 private:
01797         //
01798         // Internal functions.
01799         //
01800         void MarkAsRow()
01801         {
01802                 SetIsRowRecursive(true);
01803         }
01804 
01805         void MarkAsCol()
01806         {
01807                 SetIsRowRecursive(false);
01808         }
01809 
01810         void SetIsRowRecursive(bool isRow)
01811         {
01812                 m_isRow = isRow;
01813 
01814                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01815                         m_subCells[n].SetIsRowRecursive(isRow);
01816                 }
01817         }
01818 
01819         void SetDefaults()
01820         {
01821                 m_size = 0;
01822                 m_alignVertical = defaultAlignVertical;
01823                 m_alignHorizontal = defaultAlignHorizontal;
01824                 m_spacing = defaultSpacing;
01825                 m_verticalText = false;
01826                 m_sortable = false;
01827                 m_resizeAllowed = false;
01828 
01829                 m_renderer = NULL;
01830 
01831                 m_minSize = 0;
01832                 m_maxSize = (wxCoord) UNDEF_SIZE;
01833 
01834                 m_decompIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01835 
01836                 m_parent = NULL;
01837                 m_subIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01838 
01839                 m_table = NULL;
01840         }
01841 
01842         void ReparentSubCells()
01843         {
01844                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01845                         m_subCells[n].m_parent = this;
01846 
01847                         m_subCells[n].ReparentSubCells();
01848                 }
01849         }
01850 
01855         void RemoveSubCell(size_t index)
01856         {
01857                 m_subCells.RemoveAt(index);
01858         }
01859 
01860 
01861         //
01862         // Variables.
01863         //
01864         wxAdvHdrCellArray m_subCells;
01865 
01866         wxString m_label;
01867         wxCoord m_size;
01868         wxCoord m_minSize;
01869         wxCoord m_maxSize;
01870 
01871         int m_alignVertical;
01872         int m_alignHorizontal;
01873 
01874         wxCoord m_spacing;
01875 
01876         bool m_verticalText;
01877 
01878         bool m_sortable;
01879         bool m_resizeAllowed;
01880 
01881         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *m_renderer;
01882 
01883         wxAdvHdrCell *m_parent;
01884         size_t m_subIndex;
01885 
01886         //
01887         // used internally by wxAdvTable
01888         //
01889         // for wxAdvTable to store row/column position
01890         wxRect m_rc;
01891         size_t m_decompIndex;
01892         bool m_isRow;
01893 
01894         wxAdvTable *m_table;
01895 };
01896

02318 
02323         size_t MaxRow()
02324         {
02325                 size_t maxRow = GetDecompRowCount();
02326                 if (maxRow == 0) {
02327                         return 0;
02328                 }
02329                 return maxRow - 1;
02330         }
02331 
02336         size_t MaxCol()
02337         {
02338                 size_t maxCol = GetDecompColCount();
02339                 if (maxCol == 0) {
02340                         return 0;
02341                 }
02342                 return maxCol - 1;
02343         }
02344

02350         {
02351                 return m_model;
02352         }
